recipes.name: lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms; add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and simmer 5 minutes.
Layer noodles, ricotta cheese, meat sauce, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Bake for 25–30 minutes until bubbly. Let rest 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: pancakes
steps: In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until just combined.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake and cook until bubbles form; flip and cook until golden.
